sentences.sContent: Farming is heavily subsidized (= subsidized a lot ) by the government.
sentences.sCn: 农业得到政府的大量补贴。

synos.tran: 资助；给与奖助金；向…行贿

remMethod.val: 来自subsidy (n. 补助金， 津贴)

words.tran: 资助或补助（subsidize的过去时和过去分词）

trans.tranCn: 给补助金 / 津贴 / 奖金
trans.tranOther: if a government or organization subsidizes a company, activity etc, it pays part of its costs
